q: [...] A visit to Tunisia by defence secretary Donald Rumsfeld in February 2006 proves even more revealing:`` We have a very long relationship with Tunisia,'' Donald Rumsfeld remarked after the meetings. Tunisia is a moderate Muslim nation that has been and is today providing very constructive leadership in the world. The struggle that's taking place within that faith is a serious one, an important one. There's a very small number of violent extremists on the one side against a broad, overwhelming majority of people who are moderate. it was Kenyon Martin 's defense that had coach George Karl talking. Allen Iverson had 36 points, Joel Anthony added 33 and Kenyon Martin shut down Toronto all-star Chris Bosh late as Denver rallied to beat the Toronto Raptors 109-100 on Sunday afternoon. Kenyon Martin 's defense on Chris Bosh was incredible and got better as the game went on, George Karl said.`` You win games with stops more than making shots. I thought Kenyon Martin was the star of the game.'' JR Smith scored 14 points and Marcus Camby had 15 rebounds as Denver rallied from a

Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are`` very routine'' for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings. Previous article Grand jury

in particular, new products.`` We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision-making for a long time,'' Eric Schmidt said in a statement released by Google. By clarifying our individual roles, we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead, and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. Internally, Eric Schmidt , 55, will continue to act as an adviser to Page, 37, and Google co-founder Sergey Brin , also 37, who will also focus on strategic projects and new products. The
